instance_template: cpu("Ryzen7", 300). cpu("i9", 400). cpu("Xeon", 500). gpu("RTX4060", 350). gpu("RTX3090", 700). gpu("Quadro", 800). mobo("X670", 180). mobo("Z690", 200). mobo("C621", 250). psu("Bronze", 80). psu("Gold", 120). psu("Platinum", 160). high_power("RTX3090"). high_power("Quadro").
generator: 1 { selected_cpu(C) : cpu(C, Cost) } 1. 1 { selected_gpu(G) : gpu(G, Cost) } 1. 1 { selected_mobo(M) : mobo(M, Cost) } 1. 1 { selected_psu(P) : psu(P, Cost) } 1.

hard_constraints.description: Ensure that power-intensive graphics cards are not paired with a low-efficiency Bronze PSU to prevent power failure.
Verify that the Xeon processor is only used with its designated workstation-class C621 motherboard.
Confirm that the Ryzen7 processor is paired strictly with the X670 motherboard.
Check that the i9 processor is never assigned to an X670 motherboard, as they are incompatible.
A Quadro graphics card requires a server-grade Xeon CPU to satisfy professional hardware requirements.
Ensure the Quadro graphics card is not installed in a Z690 motherboard due to hardware limitations.

soft_constraints.description: Account for the cost of the selected CPU to include it in the overall budget minimization.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("cpu_cost", C, Cost) :- selected_cpu(C), cpu(C, Cost).

soft_constraints.description: Account for the cost of the selected GPU to include it in the overall budget minimization.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("gpu_cost", G, Cost) :- selected_gpu(G), gpu(G, Cost).

soft_constraints.description: Account for the cost of the selected motherboard to include it in the overall budget minimization.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("mobo_cost", M, Cost) :- selected_mobo(M), mobo(M, Cost).

soft_constraints.description: Account for the cost of the selected power supply unit to include it in the overall budget minimization.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("psu_cost", P, Cost) :- selected_psu(P), psu(P, Cost).

global_objective: #minimize { Cost, Type, Item : penalty(Type, Item, Cost) }.
